title: Modern Cottage
description: Build a private house 840 sq. feet with a large living room, three bedrooms, two bathrooms, a terrace, a pool and a garage for two cars.
Modern design and care for each family member to feel as comfortable as possible in the new home.

gallery.alt: A modern A-frame house with a large gabled roof, a wood and stone facade, and expansive glass windows that reveal a cozy, well-lit interior. The home is nestled in a lush green forest.
A modern A-frame house with a gabled roof, a wood and stone facade, and large glass windows. The home is nestled in a forest with green lawn.
Modern two-story house with glass balcony, wood and stone facade, surrounded by pine trees — North Shore project by Createx Construction.
North Shore — modern two-story house with floor-to-ceiling windows, wood and stone facade, outdoor fireplace and deck surrounded by forest
orth Shore — sleek two-story house with glass balcony, wood accents, and landscaped entrance partially obscured by a tall tree
North Shore interior — modern living room with dark wood entertainment wall, fireplace, sectional sofa, and built-in shelving
